template.name: Agents_Pending Reboot
template.template_md:
{% block content %} # {{title}} ## {{yo}} Heading {% for agent in data_sources.agentsPendingReboot %} {% endfor %}
Hostname Needs Reboot Last Seen
{{agent.hostname}} {{agent.needs_reboot}} {{agent.last_seen.strftime('%m/%d/%Y')}}
{% endblock %}
template.template_variables:
data_sources:
  agentsPendingReboot:
    filter:
      needs_reboot: true
    limit: 1000
    model: agent
    only:
    - hostname
    - needs_reboot
    - last_seen
title: All Agents Needing Reboot
